--- select_singer_with_tableset.sql
SELECT * FROM Singers
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM Singers

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.CompoundQuery{
    Op:       "UNION",
    Distinct: false,
    Queries:  []ast.QueryExpr{
      &ast.Select{
        Select:   0,
        Distinct: false,
        As:       nil,
        Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
          &ast.Star{
            Star:    7,
            Except:  (*ast.SelectExcept)(nil),
            Replace: (*ast.SelectReplace)(nil),
          },
        },
        From: &ast.From{
          From:   9,
          Source: &ast.TableName{
            Table: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 14,
              NameEnd: 21,
              Name:    "Singers",
            },
            Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
            As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
            Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
          },
        },
        Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
        GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
        Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
        OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
        Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
      },
      &ast.Select{
        Select:   32,
        Distinct: false,
        As:       nil,
        Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
          &ast.Star{
            Star:    39,
            Except:  (*ast.SelectExcept)(nil),
            Replace: (*ast.SelectReplace)(nil),
          },
        },
        From: &ast.From{
          From:   41,
          Source: &ast.TableName{
            Table: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 46,
              NameEnd: 53,
              Name:    "Singers",
            },
            Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
            As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
            Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
          },
        },
        Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
        GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
        Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
        OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
        Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
      },
    },
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers UNION ALL SELECT * FROM Singers
